mapper.select: SELECT c.SHORTCUT_ID,t.FUNCTION_NAME functionName,c.FUNCTION_CODE , c.USER_ID,t.FUNCTION_ICON functionIcon,s.URL FROM SYS_USER_SHORTCUT c,SYS_FUNCTION_B t,SYS_RESOURCE_B s WHERE c.FUNCTION_CODE=t.FUNCTION_CODE AND c.USER_ID=#{userId} AND t.RESOURCE_ID = s.RESOURCE_ID order by t.FUNCTION_ID
